review: It barely worked for me.  I bought one for my son and it constantly buffered or stopped working all together.  We have a lot of devices in our house that work on wifi and every one of them worked just fine.  Only the stick constantly did not work.  I finally replace it with a roku and he has had no more problems and is able to watch tv just fine.
author: SeasideUMC
